data.message: Why does diet coke and coke light taste so different?

replies.message: Hi Aaron, Diet Coke and Coke Light are essentially similar products, both containing the sweeteners aspartame and acesulfame K. The core ingredients and the flavourings of the two products are very much the same. However as the ingredients as sourced locally in each country product formulas may be slightly different. Thanks.
Literally admitting it's just another con 😂
And the fact it's just sweeteners. Hilarious

Hi Aaron, Diet Coke and Coke Light are essentially similar products, both containing the sweeteners aspartame and acesulfame K. The core ingredients and the flavourings of the two products are very much the same. However as the ingredients as sourced locally in each country product formulas may be slightly different. Thanks.
Thanks for clarifying that once again..

Hi Louis, the most important commitment we make as a company is to deliver safe, high-quality products. Numerous food and drink agencies around the world have reviewed aspartame and approved it as safe for use. For more info on aspartame and its safety, please visit: http://spr.ly/61858TAm9
